title: EU agency OKs COVID-19 vaccine, 1st shots expected in days
author: ALEKSANDAR FURTULA; FRANK JORDANS Associated Press
description: AMSTERDAM (AP) — The European Union drug regulator recommended the BioNTech-Pfizer coronavirus vaccine for use Monday, raising hopes that the 27 nations in the bloc can begin administering the first shots to their citizens shortly after Christmas.
